menu.name: Hippo Burger
menu.desc: A juicy in house burger made from ethically sourced grounded Hippos. Flame grilled to perfection.

menu.name: Hippo Steak
menu.desc: Our steaks are dry aged for 99 years to achieve the ultimate taste. Steaks are served only medium-rare, anything different is an insult towards our world-renown chefs.

menu.name: Spaghetti + Hippo Balls
menu.desc: Our spaghetti is made fresh daily accompanied by only the most juicy pairs of Hippo balls.

menu.name: Hippo Pot Pie
menu.desc: Freshly baked daily. This is the ultimate blend of sweet and savory to blast your taste buds to the next level.

menu.name: Braised Hippo
menu.desc: This braised Hippo meat will take you to Nirvana.

menu.name: Hippo Milk
menu.desc: Decadent flavour profile from the freshest of fresh Hippos

menu.name: Orange Juice
menu.desc: Sweet and tangy organic orange juice.
